predictions.text: NOAA SWPC will record at least one G3 (Kp≥7) or higher geomagnetic storm between 2025-11-12 and 2025-11-15 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirmation via NOAA SWPC event logs or alerts indicating a G3 or higher geomagnetic storm (G-scale) occurring within the stated UTC window.
monitoring_signals: Real-time Kp index and SWPC G-scale alerts
ACE/DSCOVR solar wind (Bz, speed) ahead of CME arrival
Auroral oval forecasts and HF radio blackout reports
predictions.rationale: An X5.1 flare prompted a G4 watch; CME arrivals typically follow within 1–3 days, raising odds of at least G3 conditions.

predictions.text: On at least one U.S. date by 2025-11-24, FlightAware will report ≥2,500 cancellations within/into/out of the United States.
predictions.verification_criteria: FlightAware daily statistics show total U.S. cancellations ≥2,500 on any single U.S. local date in the window.
monitoring_signals: FAA advisories/ground stops (NAS Status)
Weather systems impacting major hubs
Airline operational recovery updates and crew availability
predictions.rationale: Post-shutdown operational resets and staffing strains increase cancellation risk into early holiday travel.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, the European Commission will publish a formal legislative proposal to phase out Huawei and/or ZTE equipment from EU telecom networks.
predictions.verification_criteria: A Commission-adopted proposal (COM(2025) document or equivalent) published on the EC site or press corner explicitly mandating phase-out of Huawei/ZTE gear.
monitoring_signals: EC weekly College agenda and press briefings
Member-state digital ministers’ statements
Draft texts/leaks on ‘Have Your Say’ portal
predictions.rationale: EU momentum toward supply chain security could accelerate a bloc-wide legal proposal, though timing risk remains.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, Walmart U.S. or Kroger will announce broad multi-category price reductions (≥500 items) via an official newsroom post or press release.
predictions.verification_criteria: Corporate newsroom/press release explicitly announcing price cuts spanning multiple categories and covering at least 500 items.
monitoring_signals: Holiday pricing campaigns and circulars
Competitor pricing moves (Target, Aldi, regional grocers)
CPI grocery subcomponents and retailer commentary
predictions.rationale: Target’s cuts heighten competitive pressure for holiday traffic; mass merchants often match with broad pricing actions.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, CISA will issue at least one new Emergency Directive to federal civilian agencies.
predictions.verification_criteria: A new Emergency Directive appears on cisa.gov/emergency-directives dated within the window (e.g., ED-25-0x).
monitoring_signals: Active exploitation reports of high-severity CVEs
CISA Known Exploited Vulnerabilities (KEV) updates
Vendor advisories for widely used federal software
predictions.rationale: Resumed federal operations and active threat landscape raise, but don’t guarantee, the need for an emergency directive.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, at least one Fortune 500 company will file an SEC Form 8-K disclosing a material cybersecurity incident under Item 1.05.
predictions.verification_criteria: An 8-K on SEC EDGAR from a 2025 Fortune 500 firm includes Item 1.05 text, filed within the window.
monitoring_signals: Unusual outage reports and ransomware claims
CISA/FBI joint advisories
Security researchers noting widespread exploitation
predictions.rationale: Material cyber incidents among large issuers occur regularly; the 8-K cyber rule increases disclosure cadence.

predictions.text: From 2025-11-12 close to 2025-11-30 close, iShares Russell 1000 Value (IWD) will outperform iShares Russell 1000 Growth (IWF) by ≥1.5 percentage points on an adjusted-close basis.
predictions.verification_criteria: Adjusted-close total return data from a reputable source (e.g., Bloomberg, Yahoo Finance) show IWD return minus IWF return ≥ +1.5 pp over the period.
monitoring_signals: Breadth metrics (advance/decline, equal-weight vs cap-weight spreads)
Rates moves impacting duration-sensitive growth
Cyclicals’ earnings guidance and PMIs
predictions.rationale: Recent breadth improvement and rotation suggest a tactical window for value to outperform growth.

predictions.text: The ICE BofA MOVE Index will close at or above 100.0 on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: A published daily close for the MOVE index ≥100.0 from ICE, Bloomberg, or equivalent source within the period.
monitoring_signals: Treasury auction outcomes and tails
Releases of delayed CPI/PPI/retail sales data
Fed communications and front-end rate repricing
predictions.rationale: Data catch-up and policy uncertainty can spark rate-volatility spikes back to triple digits.

predictions.text: NYMEX WTI front-month futures (CL) will settle at or below $76.00 per barrel on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: CME official settlement for the front-month WTI contract is ≤$76.00 on any trading day within the window.
monitoring_signals: EIA inventory builds and product cracks
OPEC+ headlines and compliance indicators
Global growth data and dollar strength
predictions.rationale: Seasonal builds and macro uncertainty can pressure crude; Brent downside risk supports WTI testing mid-$70s.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, OFAC will announce at least one DPRK-related sanctions designation via an official U.S. Treasury press release.
predictions.verification_criteria: A Treasury press release from OFAC referencing North Korea/DPRK sanctions designations dated within the window.
monitoring_signals: DPRK missile tests or arms transfer reporting
UN Panel of Experts or allied sanctions announcements
U.S.-ROK-Japan trilateral statements
predictions.rationale: Periodic DPRK sanctions actions continue, particularly following provocations or illicit finance disclosures.

predictions.text: EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report will show a weekly change in U.S. motor gasoline stocks of +4.0 million barrels or more in at least one report published by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: An EIA WPSR table indicates a weekly motor gasoline inventory build of ≥+4.0 million barrels in any report released within the period.
monitoring_signals: Refinery utilization rates and turnaround schedules
Product supplied (demand) trends
Import/export flows and PADD-level inventory changes
predictions.rationale: Shoulder-season demand plus higher runs can produce outsized weekly gasoline builds.
